page.title: 05SURVEY OF FARMS (CONT'D)
page.content: {4) Langham Farm -}Dairy Farm,96 acres. Crops: Barley, grass. Livestock: 100 cattle, 60 Friesians in milk. 1.Milk production restricted by quota. 2.During May/June farmer receives 5p pint when milk to consumer is 24p pint. 3.7p-8p pint received for remaining months. 4.Production and marketing and distribution controlled by Milk Marketing Board. {5) Normanby Lodge Farm -}1100 acres. Crops: Mixed cereals, sugar beet, potatoes. Livestock: 600 ewes, 100 Lincoln Reds and Charolais beef cattle. Soil type: hilly grazing land and woodland. Problems: wind damage, most land on highest point in Lincolnshire.
